Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #5# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Hylian Shield#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Spinning Scythe Silver Rupee Center Left

GC (Maze).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Queen Gohma#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Queen Gohma# holds...^ #a Zora Scale# and #a Silver Rupee for Ganon's Castle#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Map of the Deku Tree#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Deku Tree#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Requiem of Spirit#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.
